org.eng.storage

Class AbstractFiledItemStorage<ITEM>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.storage.AbstractReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
      • org.eng.storage.AbstractDeleteableItemStorage<ITEM>
        • org.eng.storage.AbstractFiledItemStorage<ITEM>
  • Type Parameters:
    ITEM -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDeleteableItemStorage<ITEM>, IItemStorage<ITEM>, IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONFiledItemStorage, SerializedFiledItemStorage

    public abstract class AbstractFiledItemStorage<ITEM>
extends AbstractDeleteableItemStorage<ITEM>
implements IItemStorage<ITEM>
    Provides the base interface implementation only requires the subclass to provide a few methods.

    TODO: This instance is thread-safe but not process safe as no file locking is done in the file system to assure exclusive access.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractFiledItemStorage

        public AbstractFiledItemStorage(String storageDirectory,
                                String name)
        Create the instance to use the given directory to store the items and name the file containing the ids.
        Parameters:
        storageDirectory - directory where files associated with this storage instance will be written. The directory must already exist otherwise an exception will be thrown.
        name - name associated with the directory and that is used to construct a file in the directory that will contain the ids of items in the instance. Since this is used to create a file, it must contain only characters that are valid in the file system.

      • update

        public boolean update(String id,
                      ITEM item)
               throws StorageException
        Description copied from interface: IItemStorage
        Updates the item with the given id.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IItemStorage<ITEM>
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of previously stored item.
        item - new value for item at the given id.
        Returns:
        false if the item with id was not found, otherwise true and item was updated.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if the id is invalid.
